name: Mysterious - Charming - Uncommon Transylvania
description: This is a 3 day exploration trip. The purpose of it is to unveil the wild beauty of Romania and in this particular case, the amazing flavor of Transylvania. The trip is designed especially for the adventures and not for the weak. It's made for those who want to discover, who like to be  astonished and who appreciate the spiciness of a raw country like Romania. It has cultural attractions, beautiful architecture and history but as well exquisite wild landscapes. And for those who enjoy the Transylvanian legends there are some creepy facts and places waiting to be revealed.
